channel.title: Born Entity [Team Needed]
channel.description:
[center]I need some staff for my server to help me get it up and running![/center] [center]Here are some of the positions i need Server Coder: 0/2 Client Coder: 0/2 Forum coder: 1/2 (Michael) Advertiser: 1/2 (JayJay) Idea Man: 1/2 (Lewis)[/center] [center]If you get any of these positions doesn't mean that you get automatic mod or admin! Remember that[/center]
[center]Application Position wanted: Experience: Any past work we can see or someone we can talk to to make sure?: Will you abuse your powers if you are Admin/Mod?: Will you complete your work and not slack off/not do your job?: Why do you think you'd benefit PkPortalz?: Why do you want this job?: Any additional information:[/center]
[center]You may apply for up to 2 positions[/center] [center]Contact Info Skype: zach.amrein If you don't have a skype, please make one. Thank you for reading this, we hope you'll apply.[/center] ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Owner - Rjfire Co-Owners - Lewis

item.title: Born Entity [Team Needed]
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Fix the development, this thread is useless otherwise.

Read full topic

item.title: Born Entity [Team Needed]
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“zarrton098, post:3, topic:396638”]dude just listen i know that this is Hybrid PvP and everything but, you expect a brand new server to just have everything change magically in a couple minutes without a coder. This is why i have posted this, its because i need people to help me change the whole look of it.[/quote]This section is nto used so you can get a team to do your work, it is a place where you work side by side with another person or team to complete a development.

Read full topic

item.title: Born Entity [Team Needed]
item.dc:creator: @St0ner1 St0ner_
item.description:
@St0ner1 wrote:

[quote=“zarrton098, post:3, topic:396638”]dude just listen i know that this is Hybrid PvP and everything but, you expect a brand new server to just have everything change magically in a couple minutes without a coder. This is why i have posted this, its because i need people to help me change the whole look of it.[/quote]God you’re so fucking new! LOLOL. First of all ‘a coder’ I hate that term, that’s what little noob faggots say thinking they’re a boss when they hosted a 99.9% leeched server. This is 100% leeched and to ‘change magically’ it takes less then 30 minutes to change a SMALL amount of configs around to ‘change’ a server.
This is an advertisement…

Read full topic

item.title: Born Entity [Team Needed]

item.description:
@zarrton098 wrote:

dude just listen i know that this is Hybrid PvP and everything but, you expect a brand new server to just have everything change magically in a couple minutes without a coder. This is why i have posted this, its because i need people to help me change the whole look of it.

item.title: Born Entity [Team Needed]
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

And what do you intend to change…? You havn’t shown us anything that is not in Hybrid Pvp v3, as far as I am concerned this is just an advertisement without a download link.

Read full topic

item.title: Born Entity [Team Needed]
item.dc:creator: @zarrton098 zarrton098
item.description:
@zarrton098 wrote:

[center]I need some staff for my server to help me get it up and running![/center]

[center]Here are some of the positions i need

Server Coder: 0/2
Client Coder: 0/2
Forum coder: 1/2 (Michael)
Advertiser: 1/2 (JayJay)
Idea Man: 1/2 (Lewis)[/center]

[center]If you get any of these positions doesn’t mean that you get automatic mod or admin! Remember that[/center]

[center]Application

Position wanted:

Experience:

Any past work we can see or someone we can talk to to make sure?:

Will you abuse your powers if you are Admin/Mod?:

Will you complete your work and not slack off/not do your job?:

Why do you think you’d benefit PkPortalz?:

Why do you want this job?:

Any additional information:[/center]

[center]You may apply for up to 2 positions[/center]

[center]Contact Info
Skype: zach.amrein

If you don’t have a skype, please make one.

Thank you for reading this, we hope you’ll apply.[/center]

Owner - Rjfire
Co-Owners - Lewis
